snippet.title: HYADES - Mother Direct 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer was featured in the 06.13.21 Mother Direct, which you can check out below!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6ducLZFNl8&ab_channel=MotherForever

When the only world you've ever known is in danger, what would you do to save it?

HYADES is an in-development RPG about a group of friends exploring a vast urban city in order to save everything they've ever known. Align yourself with celestial signs as you explore the city of Hyades and uncover the secrets lurking below!

Demo available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and in desktop and mobile browsers!

Itch.io: https://majimjam.itch.io/hyadesrpg
https://gamejolt.com/games/HYADESRPG/415095

Check out our spinoff visual novel series - HYADES Celestial Buddies!

Itch.io: https://majimjam.itch.io/hyadescelest...
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/HYADESCelestialBuddiesVol1/451433

Contact:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HYADESRPG
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hyadesrpg/
Email: hyadesrpg@gmail.com

#MOTHER #Earthbound #Nintendo #HYADES #HYADESRPG
